text: Hlengiwe Buhle Mkhize MP (6 September 1952 â€“ 16 September 2021) was a South African politician. She was a member of the National Assembly from 2009 until her death. She was Minister of Home Affairs in 2017 and Minister of Higher Education, Science and Technology from 2017 until 2018. Mkhize died on 16 September 2021 at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2021 deaths Category:South African MPs
title: Hlengiwe Mkhize
